name: phonebook-server
description: Back end for Full Stack Open 2022 phonebook app, using RESTful API.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../'Full Stack Open 2022'/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../phonebook-server
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Eric Thornton
